strapiPost.title: Interstate 49 Project on Track
strapiPost.content:
Work to complete the $66.59 million interchange for the Bella Vista Bypass in Arkansas has continued without delay and should be completed in late 2021. - TB&P

  • "Emery Sapp & Sons of Columbia, Mo., is completing the final two segments of the bypass in Arkansas, including the interchange at U.S. Highway 71 in northern Bentonville and 2.6 miles of the bypass, from Benton County Road 34 to the Missouri state line." - TB&P
  • Estimated completion is late summer or early fall 2021. In August the related project to widen I-49 there opened to traffic and was the final widening segment in NWA.
  • Deep Dive - More information can be found HERE
